trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Charleston
There were no other sightings in Charleston on or around June 8th 2003
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was the end of a fireworks show at Middleton Place plantation. My friendnoticed some lights in the sky which I immediately dismissed as a plane afterwatching the lights move they suddenly changed direction, then again, and againright left and up and down then simply disappeared off.
